article.headline: Morgan State 62, Howard 45
article.story: WASHINGTON (AP) -- Samuel Brand scored 15 points to lead Morgan State to a 62-45 win over Howard on Saturday. The Bears (4-7, 3-1 MEAC) used a 21-6 run at the beginning of the second half to all but put the game away. Brand hit 6-of-11 from the field, including two 3-point baskets during the key run that saw Morgan State go from a two-point halftime lead to a 46-29 advantage with 14 minutes left in the game. Morgan State leads the MEAC in three-point shooting percentage and three-pointers made per game. Reggie Winkfield scored nine points. Ronald Timus netted six and grabbed eight rebounds. James Wilkinson scored a game-high 16 points for the Bison (3-8, 1-1). Seye Aluko added nine points and 11 rebounds.
